subject: GREETINGS FROM DHL DELIVERY COMPANY
body:
Dear Customer ,

This is DHL Courier Delivery Company United Kingdom London, the management
of this company, wishes to inform you that, we received a parcel containing
an / Bank Draft/ ATM Master Card valued $2.5 million USD with some vital
documents attached on it, for safety delivery to your home address ,within'
the next 48hrs as soon as we hear back from you. I am directed to inform
you that your payment verification and confirmations is OK.

This parcel was brought to us on the 6th of this month by the ATM Card
payment office/UBA Bank Director as your inheritance approved fund to be
delivered to you,without delay, we are instructed that with the ATM card
from UBA that you can start to withdraw your fund at value of $5,000 per
day until you withdraw the total fund, we re only handed over your ATM card
with some vital document to ship to your address and therefore we will
register your ATM delivery and send you the tracking numbers and before we
proceed for the shipment registration you should reconfirm the following
required information for safety delivery.

Full names..............
Parcel owner address...........
phone...............
Sex...........
occupation.........
Scan Copy of Your International Passport Or Driver's License

We are also informed by the depositor of the ATM card here that you shall
only have to pay for the clearance of your shipment as the other necessary
documents have been taken care of. by the United Nation/UBA Bank, the
clearance charge is next payment in line and that is the only payment In
order to register your ATM card delivery and move it to your address today .

______THANKS & REGARD_________

Mr Daniel Hills
Dispatch Manager DHL Company
Direct Line :

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM DHL DELIVERY COMPANY
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information about the Bank Draft ATM Master Card that is supposed to be delivered to my address. Could you please provide more details about how I can confirm and receive this parcel safely?

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM DHL DELIVERY COMPANY
body:
Attention Dear Customer ,

  Thanks for your prompt response.This is to officially inform you about
the delivery of your Bank Draft/ ATM Master Card package which was
delivered to us by the Director of Uba bank , However kindly reconfirm your
full Name, Address, Contact (Mobile) Phone Number, A copy of your ID Card
or passport. . The package is a valuable item as it has been registered
here in our custody. All the documents will be sent to you along with your
package .

Be rest assured that your Package has been confirmed valid and true and
delivery will be made once you have met the necessary requirements.

We Are Glad To Serve You Better .

Mr Daniel Hills
Dispatch Manager DHL Company
Direct Line : +44 7497 814685

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM DHL DELIVERY COMPANY
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to inform me about the delivery of my Bank Draft ATM Master Card package. I appreciate your assistance with this matter. Could you please provide more details on how I can confirm my full Name, Address, Contact Mobile Phone Number, and provide a copy of my ID Card or passport? I want to ensure that everything is in order before proceeding. Thank you for your help!

Best wishes,
Kenneth
